mwegroup.name: AdjSubstAdjFix
mwegroup.condition:
and( inter(base[0],$s:A1), inter(class[0],{adj}), inter(base[1],$s:S), inter(class[1],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(base[2],$s:A2), inter(class[2],{adj}), //agrpp(0,1,{nmb,gnd,cas}), agr(0,2,{nmb,gnd,cas}), setvar($Pos1, 0), setvar($Pos2, 1), setvar($Pos3, 2)
)

mwegroup.name: SubstAdjAdjFlex
mwegroup.condition: //zespół wokalny ($A1) męski ($A2) or( and( inter(base[0],$s:S), inter(class[0],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(base[1],$s:A1), inter(class[1],{adj}), inter(base[2],$s:A2), inter(class[2],{adj}), agr(0,2,{nmb,gnd,cas}), setvar($Pos1, 1), setvar($Pos2, 0), setvar($Pos3, 2) ),//and and( inter(base[0],$s:A1), inter(class[0],{adj}), inter(base[1],$s:S), inter(class[1],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(base[2],$s:A2), inter(class[2],{adj}), agr(0,2,{nmb,gnd,cas}), setvar($Pos1, 0), setvar($Pos2, 1), setvar($Pos3, 2) ), and( inter(base[0],$s:A2), inter(class[0],{adj}), inter(base[1],$s:S), inter(class[1],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(base[2],$s:A1), inter(class[2],{adj}), agr(0,2,{nmb,gnd,cas}), setvar($Pos1, 2), setvar($Pos2, 1), setvar($Pos3, 0) ) )//or

mwegroup.name: SubstAdjSubstGenSgFix
mwegroup.condition:
and( inter(base[0],$s:S), inter(class[0],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(nmb[0],{sg}), inter(base[1],$s:A), inter(class[1],{adj}), inter(base[2],$s:GenS), inter(class[2],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(cas[2],{gen}), agrpp(1,2,{cas,nmb,gnd}), setvar($Pos1, 0), setvar($Pos2, 1), setvar($Pos3, 2)
)

mwegroup.name: SubstSubstGen1SubstGen2PlFix
mwegroup.condition: //wieża ($S) kontroli ($GenS1) lotów ($s:GenS2) and( inter(base[0],$s:S), inter(class[0],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(base[1],$s:GenS1), inter(class[1],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(cas[1],{gen}), inter(nmb[1],{sg}), inter(base[2],$s:GenS2), inter(class[2],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(cas[2],{gen}), inter(nmb[2],{pl}), setvar($Pos1, 0), setvar($Pos2, 1), setvar($Pos3, 2) )

mwegroup.name: SubstSubstGen1SubstGen2SgFix
mwegroup.condition: //placówka służby zdrowia and( inter(base[0],$s:S), inter(class[0],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(base[1],$s:GenS1), inter(class[1],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(cas[1],{gen}), inter(nmb[1],{sg}), inter(base[2],$s:GenS2), inter(class[2],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(cas[2],{gen}), inter(nmb[2],{sg}), setvar($Pos1, 0), setvar($Pos2, 1), setvar($Pos3, 2) )

mwegroup.name: SubstInterpSubstPlFix

mwegroup.name: Subst3CordFix
mwegroup.condition: //brud, smród i ubóstwo and( inter(base[0],$s:S1), inter(class[0],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(base[1],$s:C1), inter(class[1],{conj,interp}), inter(base[2],$s:S2), inter(class[2],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(base[3],$s:C2), inter(class[3],{conj,interp}), inter(base[4],$s:S3), inter(class[4],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(cas[0],cas[2]), inter(cas[0],cas[4]), inter(cas[2],cas[4]) )

mwegroup.condition: //ni to, ni owo and( inter(base[0],$s:Y1), inter(base[1],$s:S), inter(class[1],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(base[2],$s:Y2), inter(base[3],$s:Y3), inter(base[4],$s:A), inter(class[4],{adj,pact,ppas}), agrpp(1,4,{cas,nmb}), setvar($Pos1, 0), setvar($Pos2, 1), setvar($Pos3, 2), setvar($Pos4, 3), setvar($Pos5, 4) )

mwegroup.name: SubstNPInstCord2AdjAgFix
mwegroup.condition: //kraina mlekiem i miodem płynąca and( inter(base[0],$s:SH), inter(class[0],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(base[1],$s:SI1), inter(class[1],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(cas[1],{inst}), inter(base[2],$s:C), inter(class[2],{conj}), inter(base[3],$s:SI2), inter(class[3],{subst,ger,depr}), inter(cas[3],{inst}), inter(base[4],$s:A), inter(class[4],{adj,pact,ppas}), agrpp(0,4,{cas,nmb,gnd}), setvar($Pos1, 0), setvar($Pos2, 1), setvar($Pos3, 2), setvar($Pos4, 3), setvar($Pos5, 4) )

mwegroup.name: AdjPlusOneFix
mwegroup.condition: and( inter(base[0],$s:AH), inter(class[0],{adj,pact,ppas}), inter(orth[1],$s:T2), setvar($Pos1, 0), setvar($Pos2, 1) )
